fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Light Punch: Visit a player. Gain 1 Combo if you're the only visitor. Attack them if you have 3+ Combo.
- [__BRASS KNUCKLES__]: Requires 2 Combo. Tonight, begin charging up a punch towards a player. If uninterrupted, tomorrow night instead of doing an ability you attack that player and both their neighbors on the playerlist, skipping dead players and yourself. Gain 1 Combo if you kill 3+ players in a night.
- [__BEAT EXTEND__]: Spend [1] Combo. Choose a player. If someone visits you tonight, you attack the chosen player. Gain 2 Combo if you attack the player who visited you, plus one more Combo for each time you've killed a player with Beat Extend on previous nights.
- [__GIANT STEP__]: Requires 3 Combo. Slam a drum pedal into the ground. If no one visits you tonight, you attack 3 random players other than yourself. If someone visits you, you instead roleblock all your visitors. Gain 1 Combo for each player killed with this ability.

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value: - Overdrive (__SATCHMO DEATH BLOW __): Requires 5 Combo. Deal an Overkill attack to anyone.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- RB and Control Immune while using Giant Step
- __**Part of the Daily Streak faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill the other Fighter, then be the last one standing.
